title: Logic Pro X 10.0 - No Mountain Lion Required!
description:
Logic Pro X 10.0

This torrent is ready to be modified to let you use Logic Pro without having to run Mac OS X 10.8. (It will run on Mac OS X 10.7 or higher.) Please follow the following instructions.

To install just open the .dmg and drag/drop the Logic Pro X.app to the Application's folder. 



Important Note: 
------------------
- Don't update Logic Pro X as updating it might cause a problem. You have been warned.
- After opening the app if it complains that it is damaged then run the following command from terminal (make sure that you change /path/to/application.app to the relative application path). Command:  xattr -d -r com.apple.quarantine path/to/application.app
- To use with previous versions of Mac OS X:
	1. Localize Logic Pro X.app in the Application folder.
	2. Right-click on it and click on "Show Package Content"
	3. Using a text editor open the file called "info.plist"
	4. Using the function "Find" look up for the word "version"
	5. Right at the end of the .plist document you will find these lines:
			LSMinimumSystemVersion
	                10.8.4
	6. Just edit the second line modifying the minimum OS X system version. (for                  	example: 10.7.4)
	7. Save the new .plist document and enjoy Logic Pro X!

Please seed, support and buy if you like it.
